# Build Folders
[Dd]ebug/
[Rr]elease/
x64/
x86/
[Aa]ssets/

# User-specific files
*.rsuser
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Mono Auto Generated Files
mono_crash.*

# Windows image file caches
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db

# Folder config file
Desktop.ini

# Recycle Bin used on file shares
$RECYCLE.BIN/

# ASP.NET Scaffolding
ScaffoldingReadMe.txt

# Microsoft Azure
.azure/
.ionide/
.vscode/
.vs/
.vscode/settings.json

# Windows Azure Packaging
.csx/
*.build.csdef

# IIS
[Ii][Nn][Ee][Tt][Ll]og/
logs/
*.log

# Rider
.idea/

# Visual Studio files
.vscode/
.vs/

# NuGet
*.nupkg
project.lock.json
project.fragment.lock.json
artifacts/

# Backup & Reporting
_backup/
Reports/

# Resharper
_ReSharper.Caches/

# Web files
node_modules/
bower_components/
jspm_packages/
dist/

# Bundle config
.bundleconfig.json
.bower.json

# Yarn
.yarn/

# Publish Folder
publish/

*.pdb
